meanings.sent1: The kind bringer delivered the package to my doorstep.
meanings.sent2: The flower bringer handed out roses to everyone at the event.
meanings.sent3: The friendly bringer of cookies made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The sun is the bringer of light to the world each day.
meanings.sent5: The reliable bringer of good news always lifts our spirits.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that brings something
meanings.sent1: The pizza bringer arrived just in time for the party.
meanings.sent2: The rain bringer brought much-needed water to the dry land.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream bringer made everyone's day a little sweeter.
meanings.sent4: The wind is the bringer of change in the weather.
meanings.sent5: The teacher is the bringer of knowledge to the students.

meanings.definition: A source or cause of something
meanings.sent1: The storm was the bringer of destruction to the town.
meanings.sent2: The sun is the bringer of warmth on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock is the bringer of early mornings.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is the bringer of joy to our hearts.
meanings.sent5: The chef is the bringer of delicious meals to the restaurant.
